abstract: Silicon Valley’s love for China could be bittersweet. So says Min Zhu, co-founder of an online conference company, WebEx Communications, which was recently acquired by Cisco Systems for $3.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: Silicon Valley’s love for China could be bittersweet. So says Min Zhu, co-founder of an online conference company, WebEx Communications, which was recently acquired by Cisco Systems for $3.2 billion.

headline.main: Pitfalls for Valley V.C.s in China?
